name: Siamak Fayyaz Shahandashti
content: Siamak F. Shahandashti - Home Page Siamak F. Shahandashti PhD CS, MSc BSc EE Senior Lecturer (Associate Professor) Cyber Security and Privacy Research Group Dept. of Computer Science University of York, UK Quick Links Publications Student Supervision Teaching Academic Service Latest News 2025-11-11: Charles has passed his PhD viva today. Congratulations (soon-to-be) Dr. Dodd and his main supervisor Pooya Farshim (IOG and Durham)! Thanks to the examiners Behzad Abdolmaleki (Sheffield) and Detlef Plump (York). Charles's publications are coming up soon. 2025-09-22: Hina's work designing an lightweight DoS-resilient mempool for Bitcoin called Carbyne has been accepted to Blockchain: Research and Applications. See: ePrint, Code, Dataset, Journal Homepage 2025-09-02: Ibtihal's paper on the use of and concerns about authentication technologies among British university staff and students is accepted as late breaking work to BCS HCI 2025.
